title: Online Scientific Information Literacy Enhancement Course Using Critical Digital Pedagogy [Large-Scale]

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Science Knowledge and Experience in Using Online Learning Platforms
context.additional_context: Strengthening critical information analysis capabilities by utilizing academic library resources and Open Educational Resources (OER)

learning_goals: Learners can critically evaluate the credibility of science-related digital information sources in a VR simulation environment.
Learners can write reports analyzing the bias of scientific research topics using OER materials from academic libraries.
Learners can perform peer assessment and feedback using digital collaboration platforms with only smartphone-based tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
